title: Amazon now offers Fresh grocery delivery to those without Prime
description: Amazon is opening up its Fresh grocery delivery service to shoppers without a $139-a-year Prime membership, which was previously a requirement.

title: Intel’s forgotten Arc GPU might still have some life
description: Intel's long-forgotten discrete GPU made a sudden appearance in benchmarks after months of silence.

title: First regular drone delivery service lifts off in U.K.
description: The U.K. has launched its first regular drone-based delivery service, using the flying machine to deliver mail to remote Scottish islands.

title: This PowerPoint ploy could help hackers empty your bank account
description: Another dangerous malware is making the rounds, and this time, not even PowerPoint presentations are safe.
